data.text:
NFL Draft History

Sooners in the NFL | All-Time Draft Picks | Since 2000 | First-Rounders | Draft Notes

OU Football History & Tradition

OU has supplied 416 players all-time in the NFL Draft (fourth-highest total of all schools). Forty-nine of those players were taken in the first round including five No. 1 overall picks: quarterbacks Kyler Murray (2019), Baker Mayfield (2018) and Sam Bradford (2010), running back Billy Sims (1980) and defensive end Lee Roy Selmon (1976). OU is one of only two schools with back-to-back No. 1 overall picks (USC, 1968 and '69), and the only to produce quarterbacks picked No. 1 overall in consecutive years. Brian Bosworth was the No. 1 pick by the Seattle Seahawks in the 1987 NFL Supplemental Draft.
